de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Class AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,I extends Index>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction.AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - the type of object to compute the distances in between
    I - the type of Index used
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceFunction<O>, IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedNearestNeighborJaccardDistanceFunction

    public abstract class AbstractIndexBasedDistanceFunction<O,I extends Index>
extends AbstractDatabaseDistanceFunction<O>
implements IndexBasedDistanceFunction<O>
    Abstract super class for distance functions needing a database index.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Elke Achtert
